alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 10 at 1:51AM CST until March 12 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ SATURDAY TO 4 AM CDT /3 AM MDT/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 50 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains. * WHEN...From 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ Saturday to 4 AM CDT /3 AM MDT/ Sunday. * IMPACTS... Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Severe turbulence near the mountains will be hazardous for low flying light aircraft.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains
